metadata.title: CVE-2023-52583 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ceph: fix deadlock or deadcode of misusing dget()The lock order is incorrect between denty and its parent, we shouldalways make sure that the parent get the lock first.But since this deadcode is never used and the parent dir will alwaysbe set from the callers, let's just remove it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
